-- Megatron --

As Megatron runs down the hallway, an automessage warns him that 
something has happened to Warhead, and that the patrol leader is in 
trouble. "Damnit..." he growls, then yells into his 
comm, "Perceptor, we have to get rid of that Maximal quickly, we've 
got problems elsewhere that are more important. I'm coming out to 
show him a new meaning for the word 'idiot'." Megatron leaps out of 
the base, and the door slam shut, just missing his heels. He quickly 
looks about, and locates the Maximal, and fire two plasma blasts at 
him. He laughs emotionlessly, and his eyes flash, then glow 
red, "Foolish Maximal, you shall soon join all the other pathetic 
Maximals, IN OBLIVION." 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Near the site where the energon sphere had been, the grassy area 
> around it had died. Dead weeds covered the ground. In the blast 
hole, 
> Warhead still lied in stasis lock. However, his energy reserve 
worked 
> hard to keep him from the lethal energon radiation. So hard, that 
it 
> was almost depleted. A dangerous level had been reached, meaning 
he 
> could die if nothing was done soon. In the predacon base, a 
warning 
> signal lit up to tell the massive former-decepticon was in a 
deadly 
> situation...
